TopicTitle: What are your favorite kraken attacks?

Articles.Content:
I haven't met the kraken yet, but i have had encounters where i swore it was the kraken.

But many of you have, so what's your favorite and most funny attack ever?
When flying into Jool and suddenly flying 10 times the speed of light
One of the sneakiest krakens: the pol-hill-kraken. Eats your ship when you are ~2000m above the suface

jeb is the kracken!

http://i.imgur.com/oubgnne.jpg

Plot twist!

One of the sneakiest krakens: the pol-hill-kraken. Eats your ship when you are ~2000m above the suface

I've hit that one. Prepared for a nice, calm landing in one of the Pol Ditches behind a mountain and BAM! said mountain ate my lander.
The ones that happen to someone else. . .

One of the sneakiest krakens: the pol-hill-kraken. Eats your ship when you are ~2000m above the suface
Gilly is known to be home to such a kraken too.
Jeb is the kraken, DUN DUN DUNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN!

I always found the Krak-Attack that follows a Kerbal tripping and/or sliding down a hill to be amusing. The KSP universe is so unstable that a misstep is all it takes to consume the world into an eternal void! And of course, upon reloading the autosave after quitting and restarting the game, you will inevitably find that certain flights are... not where they should be any longer. And usually moving at speeds just a bit above what you'd expect. Or that might actually be feasibly obtainable without cheating.
